messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Re: A Chatroom Idea
messages.msgSnippet: Grrrr... just noticed that for some reason the  attacked file didn t appear in the e-mail, so here are the  instructions.   If you guys have any more
messages.messageBody:
Grrrr... just noticed that for some reason the attacked file didn't appear in the e-mail, so here are the instructions. If you guys have any more questions, feel free to send me a mail ^^

~ * ~ * ~
When the window first opens you get a pop up with some freaky looking dude. Just hit the Continue button. The next screen has 4 areas to fill out, fill them out and then hit Cancel and NOT OK.
Next you will see only a blank screen. On the line all the way to the bottom type in /server aurora.caelestia.net and hit enter. The screen called mIRC Favorites will appear. On the right, click on the button Add. Under channel type in #ShinsengumiHQ and hit the add button all the way in the bottom. This will take you back to the previous page and have the channel highlighted. All you do from there is either doubleclick on the chatroom name or highlight it and hit join on the right of the popup.
Hopefully that is helpful. I know, I know, its a bit confusing at first (I got extremely confused when I first did this). Well, hope to see you guys in there ^_^


---------------------------------
Yahoo! Mail
Use Photomail to share photos without annoying attachments.

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Re: A Chatroom Idea

messages.messageBody:
well... I did this to see if it helps any to get to the chatroom. Just follow the step and hopefully that works.

One other person eh? I don't know... it might have been be... maybe someone else? Hopefully we'll get more people in there as time goes by... and like many other chatrooms, it could be a 24 hour chat ^^

-Bunneh

i would like to join ur chatroom but i'm haveing problems. can you give me a hand?

Bunny ^_^ <shenlong71328@...> wrote: Alright... the chatroom has been created on mIRC, so tell all your friends that might be intrested in stopping by! The server name is: aurora.caelestia.net , and the room is #ShinsengumiHQ Now, all we need are member to go in and chat to keep the room running ^_______^ Right now, I'm still tinkering with the options and commands so I'll be in there for quit a while.

I'm still not sure how to work mIRC correctly, so if anyone is more familiar with the program I'm more then willing to get your help ^^;; Also, there is a way to save the chats and read them later... but as stated before I don't know how it's done (worry not, I will figure it out... eventually @_@)

-Bunneh

messages.msgSnippet: Alright... the chatroom has been created on mIRC, so tell all your  friends that might be intrested in stopping by!   The server name  is: aurora.caelestia.net
messages.messageBody:
Alright... the chatroom has been created on mIRC, so tell all your friends that might be intrested in stopping by! The server name is: aurora.caelestia.net , and the room is #ShinsengumiHQ Now, all we need are member to go in and chat to keep the room running ^_______^ Right now, I'm still tinkering with the options and commands so I'll be in there for quit a while.

I'm still not sure how to work mIRC correctly, so if anyone is more familiar with the program I'm more then willing to get your help ^^;; Also, there is a way to save the chats and read them later... but as stated before I don't know how it's done (worry not, I will figure it out... eventually @_@)

-Bunneh

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] A Chatroom Idea
messages.msgSnippet: I love this idea! Secretary s suggestions sound very practical, and I know I personally would appreciate a chat appointment and also the archives - I d like
messages.messageBody:
I love this idea!

Secretary's suggestions sound very practical, and I
know I personally would appreciate a chat
"appointment" and also the archives - I'd like to see
what went on in the chat, seeing as how I don't know
how often I'd be able to participate. Also, many of my
Japanese friends are extremely amused that such a
thing as an English Language Shinsengumi mailing list
exists!

With best wishes,

Mio.

PS. Bunneh, I have not forgotten that I'm linking your
pics for my story when I upload the next chapter - the
problem is getting around to finishing the darn thing.


--- Bunny ^_^ <shenlong71328@...> wrote:


---------------------------------
Alright, this is just an idea I'm throwing out there
for all to consider. The Shinsengumi/Edoji/& Spy
division have a an excellent home and message board
going all thanks to the sweat and blood of the
presistant fans that keep the mailing lists going
strong. My idea was, how 'bout we make a chatroom?
Maybe not on the actual site but on mIRC... Somewhere
were we can all meet and chit chat about everything
and anything that comes to mind. It'll be a great
way to get to know the memebers of the 3 mailing
lists. What do you guys think?

-Bunneh


---------------------------------

messages.subject: Re: A Chatroom Idea
messages.msgSnippet: I think that you have a great idea some things to consider: 1) in the past we ve had chats based on appointments because some of us live in different states
messages.messageBody:
I think that you have a great idea
some things to consider:

1) in the past we've had chats based on appointments because some of
us live in different states and countries however we never realize
that sometimes the chats generate new details based on our questions
to more knowledgeable members (those who know Japanese or have
studied this topic for a long time)

2) so you may want to consider asking all participants if they are
willing to have their chats be stored and posted for those who cannot
attend chats---or if not then perhaps we can replace their names with
anonymous labels

3) you may also want to make use of the forums in existence for
example there is a forum here: http://www.hajimenokizu and post
questions there too

4) if a chat is designed to be more history based then some members
may want to introduce themselves to -prevent- misunderstandings
(because we are all typing and we can't hear each other's voices and
figure out the other person's tone)

I will use myself as an example

****if someone asks me a history question on a topic I feel
comfortable in answering---I will use whatever information I know
from reading texts in English (just because we know where the info
comes from)--I may in fact ****AGREE WITH YOU**** on a {personal}
level however I will ignore my own gut feeling until I can prove it
somehow

****however if you want me to SPECULATE in a fictional sense (like if
someone wants a plot bunny for a fic) I can do so just like any other
fangirl---and then some!!! like I have 100 theories for everything
(but I also have fangirl speculation vs. speculation using history as
a framework) too

****what I'm saying is when we discuss these Shinsengumi topics be
aware that many of us can assume many, many, many stances---and when
we state something it is not some attack on person---but trying
to "think out loud" to figure out something---that's how we learn

and thank you Bunny for always contributing to the timeline which is
undergoing revision....again (^_^)

Bunny you should also feel free to take the lead too if you feel that
there will be alot of interest --- and please encourage people not to
be so shy!!!

messages.subject: A Chatroom Idea
messages.msgSnippet: Alright, this is just an idea I m throwing out there for all to  consider.   The Shinsengumi/Edoji/& Spy division have a  an excellent home and message board
messages.messageBody:
Alright, this is just an idea I'm throwing out there for all to consider. The Shinsengumi/Edoji/& Spy division have a an excellent home and message board going all thanks to the sweat and blood of the presistant fans that keep the mailing lists going strong. My idea was, how 'bout we make a chatroom? Maybe not on the actual site but on mIRC... Somewhere were we can all meet and chit chat about everything and anything that comes to mind. It'll be a great way to get to know the memebers of the 3 mailing lists. What do you guys think?

-Bunneh
